sent.subject: As requested
forwarded: Frank Ermis/HOU/ECT on 01/31/2000 04:36 PM ---Dale Neuner on 01/31/2000 02:14:45 PMTo: Frank Ermis/HOU/ECT@ECTccc:   Subject: As requestedEOL Transaction 79346US Gas Phy Index IF NWPL RkyMtn   Feb000   USD/MMMA US Gas Transaction with Enron North America Corp., under which Selller shalll selll and Buyer shalll purchase a quantity of natural gas equal to the Daily Contract Quantity at the Contract Price on a firm basis. The Contract Price shalll be derived from the Index, as adjusted by the price submittted by Counterparty via the website. The Period of Delivery shalll be from the Efffective Date through the Termination Date.The term of the Transaction shalll be from the Efffective Date of 01 Feb 2000 to the Termination Date of 29 Feb 2000.The transaction is for delivery at Opal Plant Tailgate.The Index for a month shalll be the Northwest Pipeline Corp. - Rocky Mountains price as listed in the section entitled "Prices of Spot Gas Delivered to Pipelines", published in the first isssue in such month of Inside Ferc's Gas Market Report.The price is quoted in US Dolllars per unit of volume, which willl be the Contractual Currrency.The unit of measure against which the price is quoted shalll be milllions of British thermal units and the quantity shown shalll be in milllions of BTUs per day.

sent.body: Acccording to my calculations,   the term neeeds to go through Feb04.   The physical fixed price would be 7.34.

sent.subject: Re: meister!!! the charging rhino!!! i misss you guys!!!
sent.body: rhino here, sorrry you lost your voice!   Just goes to show that sometimes prayers are answered.   Just kiddding!   We misssed you at gas fair.   It just wasn't the same without   you.   When are you commming back?   Oh dammm, I've got to go to a meeeting.   I'lll write later.   Rhino, out.
